sentences.sContent: Adding vinegar will acidify the solution.
Rising carbon dioxide levels acidify the ocean, which has a particularly devastating effect on organisms that have calcium carbonate shells, like Foraminifera.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rising carbon dioxide levels acidify the ocean, which has a particularly devastating effect on organisms that have calcium carbonate shells, like Foraminifera.
sentences.sCn: 二氧化碳含量上升致使海洋酸化，对像有孔虫这样有碳酸钙外壳的生物体所产生的影响尤为致命。

sentences.sContent: Massive releases of methane from arctic seafloors could create oxygen-poor dead zones, acidify the seas and disrupt ecosystems in broad parts of the northern oceans, new preliminary analyses suggest.
sentences.sContent_eng: Massive releases of methane from arctic seafloors could create oxygen-poor dead zones, acidify the seas and disrupt ecosystems in broad parts of the northern oceans, new preliminary analyses suggest.
sentences.sCn: 新近研究的初步分析表明，从北极海床释放的大量甲烷可能造成缺氧死区，海洋酸化并扰乱北部海洋广大地区的生态系统。

remMethod.val: acid (酸， 酸的) + ify (使) → 使酸化， 使成酸性

words.tran: 酸度；酸性；酸过多；胃酸过多
[化学] 酸化；成酸性；使……发酸

trans.tranOther: to become an acid or make something become an acid
